home.subtext1: My name is X-Fate and I’ve been mixing electronic music since 2011 – from the first beats on webradio, to festival stages, and now to my livestreams on Twitch. Whether EDM, Hardstyle, Hard-/Frenchcore or Drum & Bass: I love blending genres and inspiring people with energy and emotions. Tune in, dive deep – and join me on my musical journey!
home.subtext2: Every Tuesday at 8:00 PM – alternating between webradio and Twitch. Stop by and join live!
home.mixcloudFeedHomeTitle: Listen to the latest shows again
home.mixcloudFeedHomeCookieNote: Please accept cookies to use the Mixcloud player.
